points.title: You must report to the service any unauthorized use of your account or any breach of security
points.quoteText: Should you believe your password or security for this Website has been breached in any way, you must immediately notify us at support@calendly.com.

points.title: This service is only available to users over 13 years of age
points.quoteText: Our Website is not intended for and may not be used by individuals under 13 years of age.

points.title: You must provide your legal name, pseudonyms are not allowed
points.quoteText:
To use the Website, you need to set up a Calendly account. You may establish either a free account (“Free Account”) or a paid account (“Paid Account”). You are authorized by Calendly to set up one Free Account only. Calendly reserves the right to terminate any additional Free Accounts set up by you and any Free Accounts that have been inactive for over 6 months.

When you create an account, we collect registration-related information, which includes your email address and your name.

points.title: Third parties used by the service are bound by confidentiality obligations
points.quoteText:
We require Service Providers to agree to take reasonable steps to keep the Personal Data that we provide to them secure.
We do not authorize them to use or disclose your Personal Data except in connection with providing their services.

points.title: The service claims to be CCPA compliant for California users
points.quoteText: Calendly adopts this notice to comply with the California Consumer Privacy Act of 2019 and any subsequent amendments (“CCPA”).

points.title: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to you
points.quoteText:
This Notice is current as of the Effective Date set forth above.
This Notice may change if there is a material change to the way information is handled at Calendly, or to clarify our Notice or adjust clerical errors.
If any changes are made, we’ll post them on this page, so please be sure to check back periodically.
If you continue to use Calendly after those changes are in effect, you agree to the revised Notice.

points.title: Do Not Track (DNT) headers are ignored and you are tracked anyway even if you set this header.
points.quoteText: We do not currently recognize or respond to browser-initiated Do Not Track signals as there is no consistent industry standard for compliance.

points.title: Your data is processed and stored in a country that is less friendly to user privacy protection (in AWS US datacenters)
points.quoteText: Our application and database servers are located with Amazon Cloud Services in the United States.

points.title: The data retention period is kept to the minimum necessary for fulfilling its purposes
points.quoteText: We retain the personal data we collect for so long as is reasonably necessary to fulfill the purposes for which the data was collected, to perform our contractual and legal obligations, and for any applicable statute of limitations periods for the purposes of bringing and defending claims.

points.title: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data
points.quoteText: You may also contact us to request information about the personal data we have collected from you and to request the correction, modification or deletion of such Personal Data.

points.title: The service will only respond to government requests that are reasonable
points.quoteText: We may share your data if we believe that disclosure is reasonably necessary to comply with a law, regulation, legal, or governmental request. to respond to a subpoena, court order, warrant, or other legal process

points.title: Third parties are involved in operating the service
points.quoteText: We use other companies, agents or contractors (“Service Providers”) to perform services on our behalf or to assist us with providing services to you

points.title: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation
points.quoteText:
We may share information we collect about you, including Personal Data, in the following ways:

  • With third-party Service Providers

points.title: Your personal data is not sold
points.quoteText: We do not sell your information to any third parties or disclose it in exchange for money or other valuable consideration.

points.title: This service reserves the right to disclose your personal information without notifying you
points.quoteText: We may use your information to comply with applicable legal or regulatory obligations, including complying with requests from law enforcement or other governmental authorities, or in legal proceedings involving Calendly.

points.title: You can opt out of promotional communications
points.quoteText: You may opt out of receiving these communications at any time.

points.title: Your personal data may be used for marketing purposes
points.quoteText: . Subject to your opt-out preference, we may send you emails about new product features or other news about Calendly or on topics we think would be relevant to you

points.title: Third-party cookies are used for statistics
points.quoteText:
Subject to your opt-out preferences (see ‘Your Rights and Choices’ below), we use third-party Service Providers such as Google Analytics to provide certain analytics and Viewer interactions services to Calendly in connection with our operation of our Website, including the collection and tracking of certain data and information regarding the characteristics and activities of visitors to Calendly.
You may opt-out of relevant cookies using opt-out features on their respective websites.

points.title: Logs are kept for an undefined period of time
points.status: The Privacy Policy doesn't specify how long log data is kept.
points.quoteText: When you use Calendly, our servers automatically record information (“log data”), including information that your browser sends whenever you visit our Website.

points.title: This service tracks which web page referred you to it
points.quoteText: This log data may include the web address you came from or are going to

points.title: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels and device fingerprinting
points.status: Also: "This log data may include [...] unique device identifier"
points.quoteText: Like many websites, we and our Service Providers use Cookies, web beacons, and other technologies

points.title: Information is provided about how your personal data is used
points.quoteText: How we use the information

points.title: Information is provided about how they collect personal data
points.quoteText: how it is collected

points.title: Details are provided about what kind of information they collect
points.quoteText: What information we collect

points.title: There is a date of the last update of the agreements
points.quoteText: Effective January 1, 2020

points.title: Failure to enforce any provision of the Terms of Service does not constitute a waiver of such provision
points.quoteText: By choosing not to enforce any of these Terms, we are not waiving our rights.

points.title: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is less friendly to user privacy protection (Georgia, USA)
points.quoteText:
The Federal Arbitration Act, Georgia state law and applicable U.S.
federal law, without regard to the choice or conflicts of law provisions, will govern these Terms to the fullest extent permitted by applicable law.

points.title: You waive your right to a class action.
points.quoteText:
Class Action Waiver

Except as otherwise provided in this provision, the arbitrator may not consolidate more than one person’s claims, and may not otherwise preside over any form of a class or representative proceeding or claims (such as a class action, consolidated action or private attorney general action) unless both you and Calendly specifically agree to do so following initiation of the arbitration.

points.title: You are forced into binding arbitration in case of disputes
points.quoteText:
This provision provides that all disputes between you and us will be resolved by binding arbitration because acceptance of these Terms constitutes a waiver of your right to litigate claims and all opportunity to be heard by a judge or jury.
We prefer this because we believe arbitration is less drama-filled than litigation.
To be clear, there is no judge or jury in arbitration, and court review of an arbitration award is limited.

points.title: The service is only available in some countries approved by its government
points.quoteText:
Without limiting the foregoing: (a) you acknowledge that the Website may be subject to the United States Export Administration Regulations.
(b) you affirm that you are not, and you will not (i) permit Calendly Users or Invitees to access or use the Website in a United States embargoed country.

points.title: Any liability on behalf of the service is only limited to the fees you paid as a user or $100
points.quoteText: CALENDLY’S MAXIMUM AGGREGATE LIABILITY TO YOU IN CONNECTION WITH THESE TERMS OR THE WEBSITE, REGARDLESS OF THE FORM OF ACTION (WHETHER SUCH LIABILITY ARISES DUE TO NEGLIGENCE, BREACH OF CONTRACT, MISREPRESENTATION, OR FOR ANY OTHER REASON), WILL AT ALL TIMES BE LIMITED TO THE GREATER OF (I) THE AMOUNT PAID, IF ANY, BY YOU TO CALENDLY IN CONNECTION WITH THESE TERMS IN THE TWELVE (12) MONTHS PRIOR TO THE ACTION GIVING RISE TO LIABILITY OR (II) US $100.00

points.title: This service assumes no liability for any losses or damages resulting from any matter relating to the service
points.quoteText: IN NO EVENT WILL CALENDLY BE LIABLE TO YOU FOR ANY INDIRECT, EXTRAORDINARY, EXEMPLARY, PUNITIVE, SPECIAL, INCIDENTAL, OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES (INCLUDING LOSS OF DATA, REVENUE, PROFITS, OPPORTUNITIES, REPUTATION, USE, OR OTHER ECONOMIC ADVANTAGE) HOWEVER ARISING, EVEN IF WE KNOW THERE IS A POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGE.

points.title: You are responsible for any risks, damages, or losses that may incur by downloading materials
points.quoteText: CALENDLY WILL NOT BE LIABLE TO YOU OR OTHERS FOR ANY DAMAGES RESULTING FROM YOUR USE OF THE WEBSITE OR YOUR DISPLAYING, COPYING, OR DOWNLOADING ANY MATERIALS TO OR FROM THE WEBSITE.

points.title: The service does not guarantee that software errors will be corrected
points.quoteText: or that defects will be corrected.

points.title: This service does not guarantee that it or the products obtained through it meet your expectations or requirements
points.quoteText: Without limiting the generality of the foregoing, we make no warranty that the Website will meet your requirements

points.title: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at your sole risk
points.quoteText: THE WEBSITE AND ALL CONTENT ARE PROVIDED "AS IS" AND "WITH ALL FAULTS" AND THE ENTIRE RISK AS TO THE QUALITY AND PERFORMANCE IS WITH YOU.

points.title: User accounts can be terminated after having been in breach of the terms of service repeatedly
points.quoteText: We reserve the right, in our sole discretion, to terminate the account or access of any Calendly User or Invitee who is the subject of repeated DMCA or other infringement notifications.

points.title: If you are the target of a copyright holder's take down notice, this service gives you the opportunity to defend yourself
points.quoteText: In response, you may provide our Agent with a written counter-notification that includes the following information:

points.title: Instructions are provided on how to submit a copyright claim
points.quoteText:
If you believe your copyright or other intellectual property right is being infringed by a Calendly User, please provide written notice to us for notice of claims of infringement at support@calendly.com.

To be sure the matter is handled immediately, your written notice must:

points.title: You are solely responsible for claims made against the service and agree to indemnify and hold harmless the service.
points.quoteText: You agree to indemnify and hold Calendly, its parents, subsidiaries, affiliates, officers, agents, employees, resellers or other partners, and licensors harmless from any claim, demand, loss, or damages, including reasonable attorneys’ fees, arising out of or related to Personal Data, or the use thereof, including but not limited to allegations that any processing of Personal Data by Calendly and/or you under this Agreement violates any applicable law or regulation, or infringes the privacy or intellectual property rights of a third party, any content that you disclose to Calendly via your use of the Calendly Website, your use of the Website, your violation of these Terms, or your violation of any relevant law.

points.title: You are prohibited from attempting to gain unauthorized access to other computer systems
points.quoteText:
or
  • To attempt to gain unauthorized access to any portion of this Website or any other accounts, computer systems, or networks connected to this Website, whether through hacking, password mining, or any other means

points.title: Specific content can be deleted without reason and may be removed without prior notice
points.quoteText: We are not obligated to publish any information or content on our Forum and can remove information or content at our sole discretion, with or without notice

points.title: You can delete your content from this service
points.quoteText: To request removal of your information from a Forum, contact support@calendly.com.

points.title: You agree not to use the service for illegal purposes
points.quoteText: You agree to comply with all applicable domestic and international laws, statutes, ordinances, and regulations regarding your use of our Website.

points.title: The service has a no refund policy
points.quoteText: All payments are non-refundable

points.title: You authorise the service to charge a credit card supplied on re-occurring basis
points.quoteText: For renewals, Calendly will automatically charge your payment method in the amount of the then-current fee for your type of account, plus applicable taxes.

points.title: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account
points.quoteText: You agree to choose a strong and secure password(s) and maintain the confidentiality of your password(s), including any password of a third-party site that we may allow you to use to access this Website.
